description: A stagnant puddle of contaminated water is spreading a foul smell in the area.
The polluted water is posing a serious health risk to nearby residents.
A big pothole right middle of the road.
A large pile of trash bags and loose rubbish is overflowing onto the sidewalk next to a building.
A large collection of garbage bags all over the road.
The road surface is severely cracked and broken, creating a driving hazard.
A city street is completely flooded.
